feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks and hyphens in a similar manner, indicating a consistent punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, suggesting a common writing style in this aspect.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts show coherence and similar levels of complexity, contributing to the likelihood of a shared writing style.

feature4.explanation: While the topics differ, both texts convey a somewhat informal tone, which could be indicative of a common authorial style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were identified in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical choices, sentence structures, and absence of spelling errors, there is moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
